growr-protocol.title: Growr: an open, fair and sustainable lending protocol on top of Bitcoin
growr-protocol.heading: An open, fair and sustainable lending protocol on top of Bitcoin
growr-protocol.subheading: Growr advances financial inclusion by enabling borrowers to receive instant unsecured loans based on a decentralized identity

value-prop.title: Why Growr protocol?
value-prop.subtitle: Growr advances financial inclusion by enabling borrowers to receive instant unsecured loans based on a decentralized identity.
value-prop.value-1-content: Growr creates a global decentralized marketplace to match supply and demand at the best possible price. This open free market creates fair conditions by enforcing the same rules for everyone.
value-prop.value-2-content: Local players can use the protocol to facilitate access to credit by understanding the risk context and defining the right risk model, and social circles play an important role in referring borrowers and supporting them throughout the loan lifecycle.
value-prop.value-3-content: Investors across the globe can deploy their excess capital through the protocol and generate yield depending on their risk appetite.
value-prop.value-4-content: Merchants can grow their revenue by offering "buy now, pay later" type of credit facilities to their customers, facilitating origination and collection within the community.
value-prop.value-5-content: Growr enforces sustainable lending policies by embedding financial health incentives for borrowers, and enables end-to-end transparency down to the level of each individual borrower how investor's capital is allocated.
value-prop.value-6-content: Instead of relying on risk data locked within proprietary databases, Growr provides an open credit record model, which also preserves the privacy of the borrowers through a self-sovereign identity.

how.title: How does it work?
how.subtitle: Growr enables institutional and individual investors to fund lending pools according to their risk/reward appetite, and borrowers to apply for and receive unsecured or partially secured loans.
how.how-1-content: A decentralized identity and credit record based on the W3C DID standard that promotes financial health through personalized advice and education.
how.how-2-content: Anyone can access and use the protocol, either directly or via a last mile provider, such as Peseta in El Salvador. This advances financial inclusion.
how.how-3-content: Tiered lending pool and lending pond smart contracts automate the liquidity funding and lending processes globally and locally, and compensate the protocol contributors (investors, risk managers, reviewers, borrowers).
how.how-4: On top of Bitcoin and integrated with Lightning
how.how-4-content: The protocol runs on top of RSK, a smart contract network secured by the Bitcoin network, and is integrated with the Lightning Network for instant global payments.
how.how-5-content: The Growr protocol incentivizes good financial health – that is, improving financial literacy and behaviors. This ultimately leads to a better lifestyle and financial independence. Financial health metrics are combined with additional off-chain and on-chain data to create a new type of decentralized identity that we call the Self-sovereign Financial Identity. It contains verifiable credentials from different sources and is presented in front of the lending pools to assert creditworthiness.

peseta.title: Peseta: fair loans made easy.
peseta.subtitle: The Peseta app was designed for El Salvador, as a simple and secure way for consumers and merchants to easily apply for loans on top of the Bitcoin network.
peseta.step-1-content: Link your bank account and social profiles to Peseta to create your personal financial identity.
peseta.step-2-content: Use the Peseta app and your financial identity to apply for a loan and get an instant response.
peseta.step-3-content: Through integration with the Lightning network, Peseta enables instant payments to any merchant in El Salvador.
peseta.step-4-content: The Peseta app has all the tools to manage every aspect of your loan transactions, withraw the amount to your Chivo wallet and easily pay it off to build your credit score.
peseta.step-5-content: Learning the features and benefits of Bitcoin through short tutorials earns you fractional bitcoin to build wealth and pay off loans.

what.title: What we do?
what.subtitle: Growr is building a global community aiming to revolutionize and democratize the way people learn, get advice, and use open, fair and sustainable financial services.
what.growr-is-community: Growr provides its members with personalized financial education and tools, within a human-focused gamified environment. Mentors are also part of the community, helping people in need get the right financial “treatment”, independently from financial service providers. They are not rewarded based on sales commissions but based on the overall success of the community members.
what.call-to-adventure: It's time to embark on a journey to financial independence, learning how to master your money and create a better life for yourself and your family.
what.step-1-content: Start with knowing your financial health, get prescription on how to improve it, monitor and experience your progress.
what.step-2-content: Learn new skills and create new habits by taking little “pills” of distilled wisdom, personalized for your situation and needs.
what.step-3-content: Creating and following your budget, knowing what you own & owe, and planning the future has never been easier with our money tools built to empower your own life moments.
what.step-4-content: Tap into our network of experienced mentors who are not incentivized to sell you a product to earn commission, but invest in your future success and the community.
what.step-5-content: In the future, financial services will be owned by the people, not the rich elite. Our marketplace provides access to the best deals from partners who have committed to give back to the Growr community – and to you as a member.
what.step-6-content: For the first time, the ownership economy enables you to own a part of the community and start earning by improving your financial health and mentoring others.
